description:
It seems as though many Netflix subscribers have been looking for reasons to cancel their subscriptions to the popular streaming service. After all, with price hikes and cancellations of fan-favorite shows, there are certainly plenty of reasons to see subscriber numbers fluctuate. Now, however, it appears that Netflix cancellations have seen a spike after co-founder [...]

The post Netflix Cancellations Soar After CEO Donated To Kamala Harris appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancellations Soar After CEO Donated To Kamala Harris
